jot.math.geometry.shape

Class AbstractRayTracerShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.shape.AbstractShape
      • jot.math.geometry.shape.AbstractRayTracerShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RayTracerPlane, RayTracerSphere, RayTracerTriangle

    public abstract class AbstractRayTracerShape
extends AbstractShape
    Abstract class that each simplex shape must implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
